BR_text.BRsummary: [2.0] [English] Third person verbs don't get lemmatised correctly
BR_text.BRdescription:
Minimal example:
 <denchmark-code>
 doc = nlp('This app works well')
 
 
 for token in doc:
     print(token, token.lemma_)
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Output:
 <denchmark-code>This this
 app app
 works works  # this should be "work"
 well well
 </denchmark-code>
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Info about spaCy</denchmark-h>
 
 
 spaCy version: 2.0.0a13
 Platform: Darwin-16.7.0-x86_64-i386-64bit
 Python version: 3.6.2
 Models: en_core_web_sm, en_default, en_vectors_web_lg

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks! I see where this went wrong.

comments_2.comment_text: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
